thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Inge Dowden

author: Inge Dowden
title: Inge Dowden
text: TrustedHousesitters is a fantastic idea that will allow us to realise our dream of living in Italy for a year, in 4 years' time. In the meantime, we're getting our ratings up by doing local sits, and this works very well. The website is easy to use, the security is good, and it's easy to communicate with people. I highly recommend this to anyone who wants to travel the world on a budget.
